EmailTemplate.subject: Having Grocery eCommerce is Non-Negotiable – Read Up on the Latest Trends
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Did you know that online grocery sales are projected to increase by 23% each year? That’s a major revenue stream that you don’t want to miss out on—and if you haven’t adopted eCommerce yet, you can bet your competitor’s have. Retailers without an online solution to accommodate the surge in spending habits are watching shoppers take their money elsewhere.
